basics.name: Alex ( Allene )
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Chief technology officer and managing principal of CryptoCashFast.com, a solution for spending cryptocurrency on everyday purchases. CryptoCashFast exchanges cryptocurrency for gift cards, prepaid cards and ecodes.

highlights: Responsible for the development and design of all the clients they brought on
I developed a total of 15 wesbites during the duration of my time here. They merge into another company and their duties changed and had no need for a developer.
Take pictures, update and maintian listings and remove listing for sold vehicles.
I sold a total of 25 cars via online sales during my duration of working here. I moved to LA and had to end our relationship.

work.summary: CSS, object oriented PHP, MVC framework, Python
highlights: This was a startup research company that delivered live pricing for ecommerce solutions.
It took me a total of two years to develop their whole platform, I stayed on as a consultant until they desolved their businses.
Live auciton site for clothing, cars, and shoes. This was a startup company I help develop and market.
I developed the frontend, backend and social prescence. BallerBiz was not able to secure funding and could not continue.
I over look all of the projects they are interested in pursuing and the source code.
After overing source code, I give them a perspective on how far along the project is and long term scope on development needs.

work.summary: CSS, object oriented PHP, MVC framework
highlights: Frontend development for the Mr. Beast impossible game puzzle that was commissioned to BitLagoon
Development of finance software in which I used CSS, PHP OOP, and Javascript in a MVC framework

work.summary: Develop the frontend UI/ UX and the backend software that tracks sales
highlights: Web portal for employees only to use, in order to create / manage RV sells
PHP, mySQL, jQuery and Javascript were used to develop the backend, custom developed frontend and backend.

work.summary: An automated solution for spending cryptocurrency.
highlights: Web application, and mobile application for both iOS and Android
ReactJS, Express and NodeJs were just a few of the technologies used.
Hosted on Google cloud and I currently manage all deployments and instances.
Developed the proprietary REST APIs used to interface with other APIs and applications.

work.summary: Social networking application that tracks users in real time
highlights: Web application, and mobile application for both iOS and Android
ReactJS, Express and NodeJs were just a few of the technologies used.
Uses Google Maps to track users in real time.
Developed the proprietary REST APIs used to interface with other APIs and applications.

volunteer.summary: Youth crisis line counselor, youth advocate
highlights: Provide crisis support for youth and parents
Teach trainees to provide support to youth in crisis
Volunteer support specialist, WPQuestions.org, 2016-Present
Volunteer support specialist, WordPressQestions.com, 2014-Present
Volunteer IT / Tech, The Tech Dealer, CA Los Angeles, 2015-2019

awards.title: Youth Advocate 2009
awards.summary: Team leader for the Boys and Girls club of America, as well as the foster youth in Sacramento, CA. Lead crisis line counselor and lead crisis line trainer at California Coalition for Youth.

awards.title: Crisis Line Counselor
awards.summary: I was given the award at the assembly for youth in 2009.
